attributes.action: Encourage Business to Pay Higher Wages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned seek more wages to live on.  We don't want benefits.  we want real wages for real work.  Not only the fat cats need money.  Business should pay staff more and take less profits. The Unions need to come back and ensure better salaries/wages. If people had better wages then there would be less need to borrow.  The economy would improve.
Barbara Ross - Social Scientist -
Harmony Care Markets
